
                            
                            <p>请教下各位老哥，京东国补为啥一小部分家电可以在提交订单页面直接看到国补优惠，而大部分需要去云闪付领券，到收银台支付页面才能使用？坐标河南，是地区差异还是京东投放国补的政策？不想去云闪付领券，怎么筛选这种提交订单时直接减的家电呢？ <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/08/134543wqtabxlllhggxq0h.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/08/134543wqtabxlllhggxq0h.jpg"> <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/08/134550or4rqr6e4e6jctyr.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202505/08/134550or4rqr6e4e6jctyr.jpg"> <br> 	    	     <br> </p><p class="pl">一样</p>
